snippet.title: Bus Simulator City Ride – Announcement Trailer | Mobile
snippet.description:
Your Bus. Your City. In Your Hands. Bus Simulator City Ride is coming in 2022 to iPhone and iPad, Android smartphones and tablets, as well as Nintendo Switch.

👉 Subscribe to our channel to stay up-to-date: https://www.youtube.com/astragon?sub_confirmation=1

astragon Entertainment and developer stillalive studios are proud to bring the well-known Bus Simulator series to brand new platforms. With the release of Bus Simulator City Ride you will be able to drive licensed buses through a lively environment wherever you please - be it at home or on the go. Once again, stillalive studios, the developers of previous Bus Simulator games such as Bus Simulator 18 and Bus Simulator 21, are responsible for the development on mobile devices and Nintendo Switch - with assistance by external studio partners.

#astragon #BusSimulatorCityRide #BusSimulator

Follow us to not miss anything:
Homepage: https://bussimulator.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BusSimGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BusSimGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bussimgame
Discord: https://discord.gg/astragon

🚍 What you can expect from Bus Simulator City Ride 🚍

Take the driver’s seat and transport people in a lively city with officially licensed buses by famous brands: Mercedes-Benz, Setra, IVECO, BYD, Volvo, Scania, or MAN. Drive routes and complete campaign missions to unlock more buses, districts, and routes. Climb up the career ladder and build a network of public transportation service for your city.

Original licensed buses are waiting for you! Drive 10 buses by 10 world famous manufacturers from electric buses to articulated or double decker buses. Together with brands such as Mercedes-Benz, Volvo, IVECO or BYD you get a variety of different buses. Thanks to detailed cockpits you can take over the driver’s seat and experience a real bus driving immersion. But it is not just driving a bus, you also can customize YOUR BUS.

Explore the very detailed and lively map! The city of “Havensburg” is inspired by northern European cities and offers with the nautical warehouse district, harbor, old town, and countryside a variety of eye-catching buildings and landscapes. 

In such a beautiful and vibrant city, people want to get around. Drinking a coffee with friends in old town or visiting the harbour with the family. Now it’s your job to transport the passengers to their various destinations. Transporting people never gets boring, maybe they will tell you some stories when driving YOUR ROUTE. 

Prove your driving skills:  Make it to the top and build a successful bus transport company. With progressing the campaign, you can unlock more buses, districts, and routes. Build up a larger network of public transportation service by driving routes to earn more credits and purchasing more buses. The success of the company is IN YOUR HANDS. 

Bus Simulator City Ride will be released in Fall 2022 on the Apple App Store and on Google Play as well as the Nintendo eShop. Next to the digital release for Nintendo Switch, a retail version will also be available in selected countries.
